common.helloWorld: Hello world! this is a test message for those who tried the language feature. While there's a big chance this app's users only use english. who know if they use french or japanese?

error.googleSignInFailed: Failed to sign in with Google. Please try again later or contact support.

signUp.passwordRequirements: Min. 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 special character
signUp.agreeByCreatingAccount: By creating an account, you agree to the <1>Terms of Use</1> and our <3>data processing policy.</3>

verifyEmail.codeSentToEmail: A code has been sent to

emailVerified.emailVerifiedDescription: Your email address has been successfully verified

step1.title:
Complete the last
steps
step1.description: Enter your personal information to create your profile.

step2.title: Enter my current weight
step2.description:
It's important to track your progress,
you can adjust it at any time.

step3.title:
Choose my level of
sports practice
step3.description:
In order to offer you programs
adapted to your training level.

step4.title:
Select my favorite
sports
step4.description: You can select up to 5 sports.

step5.title: Do you already have a coach?
step5.description:
If your coach sent you an invitation, enter the code received by
email. Otherwise, you can add them later in your profile.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.description:
To reset your password, enter your email address below.

You will receive a link by email to create a new password.

passwordChanged.title: Your password has been updated
passwordChanged.description:
You can now log in with
your new password.

passwordResetSent.title: It's sent!
passwordResetSent.description: A reset link has been sent to
passwordResetSent.didntReceiveEmail: Didn't receive an email? Check your spam or try again

resetPassword.title: Create a new password
resetPassword.description: To secure your account, create a password containing at least 8 characters, an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number and a special character (e.g.: !, ?, @).

profileCompleted.title: Congratulations!
profileCompleted.description:
Your account is ready. You can
start training!

wellness.title:
How are you feeling
today?
wellness.description:
Track your daily well-being
with these six essential parameters.
